name: A Step In Time
description:
[Press R to restart level]

A Step In Time is a sokoban style 'meta' puzzle game where blocks representing gameplay variables can be joined together to solve interesting puzzles!

[If you get stuck on a level, you can go back to level select using the top-right button, then use a key to skip the current level]

Controls

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move.
  • R to restart.
Links Font

The font used is Fibberish by Caffinate.
